article.class: post-2883 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-important-news

h3.a: **DISTRICT UPDATES** FROM Dr. SLEPPIN SUPERINTENDENT OF SCHOOLS 1. REMOTE LEARNING WILL RESUME ON MONDAY, APRIL 20, 2020. 2. ANY FAMILIES NEW TO THE DISTRICT CAN GET INFORMATION ON SCHOOL REGISTRATION BY CALLING 201-943-0564 BETWEEN THE HOURS OF 9:00 AM-1:00 PM MONDAY-FRIDAY!

article.class: post-2144 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-important-news

h3.a: **IMPORTANT** THE FAIRVIEW DISTRICT WILL PROVIDE BREAKFAST AND LUNCH MEALS TO STUDENTS ELIGIBLE FOR THE FREE AND/ OR REDUCED BREAKFAST/LUNCH PROGRAM BEGINNING MONDAY, MARCH 16, 2020 AT THE LINCOLN SCHOOL ANNEX, 130 HAMILTON AVENUE IN FAIRVIEW. THE “GRAB AND GO” MEALS WILL BE DISTRIBUTED FROM 10:00 A.M.- 12:00 P.M. MONDAY-FRIDAY DURING SCHOOL CLOSURES!!

span.em: “Raising Expectations For Each And Every Student”

img.alt: Students working on assignment at desk.

p.strong: The mission of the Fairview Public School District is to create a safe, nurturing, academic environment that celebrates the ethnic diversity of the community.

img.alt: Photo of Dr. Sleppin with class accepting donation.

p.strong: Much of the success of our programs can be attributed to a collaborative effort by educators, parents/guardians, and community members.

img.alt: Photo of the front entrance of Number 3 School

p.strong: The Fairview Board of Education is a non-partisan board composed of local community members who are elected to serve as trustees.
